thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Trump Says Senators Should Embrace His Immigration Plan, Reject Others

author: Siobhan Hughes
title: Trump Says Senators Should Embrace His Immigration Plan, Reject Others
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”President Donald Trump on Wednesday urged senators to vote against any immigration plan other than one he laid out in January, a move that could hinder a bipartisan group seeking a middle ground and leave hundreds of thousands of young, undocumented immigrants in a state of uncertainty.
In a statement, the president urged senators to vote for the White House plan, which has been translated into legislative text by a group led by Senate Judiciary Committee Chairman Chuck Grassley (R., Iowa), and against any version...
